resume.title: Jack Hoyt
resume.objectives: My goal is to gain more practical knowledge and contribute in a team of software or mobile application developers. Currently enrolled at Northeastern University where I study computer science.

work_experience.job: Mobile Application Development Intern at Assembly Co May 2015 - September 2015, May 2016 - August 2016 Wrote and debugged code used in mobile applications for various companies in the Manchester, New Hampshire area. Contributed to the development of four applications that are still used by businesses in the area today.

qualifications.additional_information: Programming experience in C++, C#, and Java
